name: entomo
description: entomo is a people experience platform built for the digital world of work. Powering 30mn+ users across organizations world-wide, entomo unleashes digital experiences that transform engagement, performance and talent development using hyper personalized insights and nudges. entomo’s clients include Global fortune 500 and large enterprises and Governments across Asia and MEA. entomo is also voted as a leader in G2 software marketplace across multiple categories
features: Everyday alignment of organizational, team and individual goals
Personalized insights and nudges to drive power performance behaviors
Engage and empower talent development and skills
Headline: unleash people experiences that transform performance, engagement and talent
ShortDescription: people experience platform built for the digital world of work
enhanced_description: entomo is a leading people experience platform designed for the modern digital workplace. It empowers over 30 million users globally by delivering hyper-personalized insights and nudges to transform employee engagement, performance, and talent development. Key functionalities include everyday alignment of organizational, team, and individual goals, driving performance behaviors through personalized insights, and fostering talent development and skill growth. entomo serves Global Fortune 500 companies, large enterprises, and Governments across Asia and MEA, and is recognized as a leader in various categories on the G2 software marketplace.
competitive_advantages: Proven success with Global Fortune 500 and large enterprises
Recognition as a leader in G2 software marketplace
